results.name: a(n)=a(3n)=a(3n+1)=a(3n+2)/2 with a(0)=1.
comment: Row sums of number triangle A117944.
Product of the nonzero digits of (n written in base 3). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 15 2020
link: Felix Fröhlich, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (first 2001 terms from Vincenzo Librandi)
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies: A(x) = (1 + x + 2*x^2) * A(x^3). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 15 2020
mathematica: Nest[ Join[#, #, 2#] &, {1}, 5] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 27 2014 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 05 2006
ext: Added a(0) = 1 in the Name by _Bernard Schott_, Dec 04 2020
